00001 /* bpred-bimode.cpp: Bi-Mode predictor [Lee et al. MICRO 1997]
00002    NOTE: Bi-Mode is *not* the same as "bimodal" (2bC) */
00003 /*
00004  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00005  */
00006 
00007 #include <math.h>
00008 #define COMPONENT_NAME "bimode"
00009 
00010 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00011 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00012 {
00013   int l1_size;
00014   int l2_size;
00015   int his_width;
00016   int Xor;
00017 
00018   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d:%d:%d:%d",name,&l1_size,&l2_size,&his_width,&Xor) != 5)
00019     fatal("bad bpred options string %s (should be \"bimode:name:l1_size:l2_size:his_width:xor\")",opt_string);
00020   return new bpred_bimode_t(name,l1_size,l2_size,his_width,Xor);
00021 }
00022 #else
00023 
00024 class bpred_bimode_t:public bpred_dir_t
00025 {
00026 
00027   class bpred_bimode_sc_t:public bpred_sc_t
00028   {
00029     public:
00030     int *bhr;
00031     my2bc_t * select_ctr;
00032     my2bc_t * pred_ctr;
00033     int updated;
00034     int lookup_bhr;
00035   };
00036 
00037   protected:
00038 
00039   int bht_size;
00040   int bht_mask;
00041   int * bht;
00042   int pht_size;
00043   int pht_mask;
00044   my2bc_t ** pht;
00045   my2bc_t * pht_meta;
00046   int history_length;
00047   int history_mask;
00048   int Xor;
00049   int xorshift;
00050 
00051   public:
00052 
00053   /* CREATE */
00054   bpred_bimode_t(char * const arg_name,
00055                  const int arg_bht_size,
00056                  const int arg_pht_size,
00057                  const int arg_history_length,
00058                  const int arg_Xor
00059                 )
00060   {
00061     init();
00062 
00063     /* verify arguments are valid */
00064     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_bht_size);
00065     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_pht_size);
00066     CHECK_NNEG(arg_history_length);
00067     CHECK_BOOL(arg_Xor);
00068 
00069     name = strdup(arg_name);
00070     if(!name)
00071       fatal("couldn't malloc bimode name (strdup)");
00072     type = strdup(COMPONENT_NAME);
00073     if(!type)
00074       fatal("couldn't malloc bimode type (strdup)");
00075 
00076     bht_size = arg_bht_size;
00077     bht_mask = arg_bht_size-1;
00078     pht_size = arg_pht_size;
00079     pht_mask = arg_pht_size-1;
00080     history_length = arg_history_length;
00081     history_mask = (1<<arg_history_length)-1;
00082     Xor = arg_Xor;
00083     if(Xor)
00084     {
00085       xorshift = log_base2(pht_size)-history_length;
00086       if(xorshift < 0)
00087         xorshift = 0;
00088     }
00089 
00090     bht = (int*) calloc(bht_size,sizeof(int));
00091     if(!bht)
00092       fatal("couldn't malloc bimode BHT");
00093     pht = (my2bc_t**) calloc(2,sizeof(my2bc_t*));
00094     if(!pht)
00095       fatal("couldn't malloc bimode pht");
00096     pht[0] = (my2bc_t*) calloc(pht_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00097     pht[1] = (my2bc_t*) calloc(pht_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00098     pht_meta = (my2bc_t*) calloc(pht_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00099     if(!pht[0] || !pht[1] || !pht_meta)
00100       fatal("couldn't malloc bimode PHT");
00101     for(int i=0;i<pht_size;i++)
00102     {
00103       pht[0][i] = MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00104       pht[1][i] = MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN;
00105       pht_meta[i] = (i&1)?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00106     }
00107 
00108     bits = bht_size*history_length + pht_size*6;
00109   }
00110 
00111   /* DESTROY */
00112   ~bpred_bimode_t()
00113   {
00114     free(pht[0]); pht[0] = NULL;
00115     free(pht[1]); pht[1] = NULL;
00116     free(pht); pht = NULL;
00117     free(pht_meta); pht_meta = NULL;
00118     free(bht); bht = NULL;
00119   }
00120 
00121 
00122   /* LOOKUP */
00123   BPRED_LOOKUP_HEADER
00124   {
00125     class bpred_bimode_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_bimode_sc_t*) scvp;
00126     int l1index = PC&bht_mask;
00127     int l2index;
00128     int select;
00129     bool pred;
00130 
00131     sc->bhr = &bht[l1index];
00132 
00133     if(Xor)
00134     {
00135       l2index = PC^(*sc->bhr<<xorshift);
00136     }
00137     else
00138     {
00139       l2index = (PC<<history_length)|*sc->bhr;
00140     }
00141 
00142     l2index &= pht_mask;
00143 
00144     sc->select_ctr = &pht_meta[PC&pht_mask];
00145     select = MY2BC_DIR(*sc->select_ctr);
00146     sc->pred_ctr = &pht[select][l2index];
00147     pred = MY2BC_DIR(*sc->pred_ctr);
00148 
00149     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00150     sc->updated = false;
00151     sc->lookup_bhr = *sc->bhr;
00152 
00153     return pred;
00154   }
00155 
00156   /* UPDATE */
00157   BPRED_UPDATE_HEADER
00158   {
00159     class bpred_bimode_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_bimode_sc_t*) scvp;
00160     bool select;
00161     bool pred;
00162 
00163     select = MY2BC_DIR(*sc->select_ctr);
00164     pred = MY2BC_DIR(*sc->pred_ctr);
00165 
00166     MY2BC_UPDATE(*sc->pred_ctr,outcome);
00167 
00168     if(!(pred == outcome && select != outcome))
00169       MY2BC_UPDATE(*sc->select_ctr,outcome);
00170 
00171     if(!sc->updated)
00172     {
00173         BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00174         BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00175         sc->updated = true;
00176     }
00177   }
00178 
00179   /* SPEC_UPDATE */
00180   BPRED_SPEC_UPDATE_HEADER
00181   {
00182     class bpred_bimode_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_bimode_sc_t*) scvp;
00183     BPRED_STAT(spec_updates++;)
00184 
00185     *sc->bhr = (((*sc->bhr)<<1)|our_pred)&history_mask;
00186   }
00187 
00188   /* RECOVER */
00189   BPRED_RECOVER_HEADER
00190   {
00191     class bpred_bimode_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_bimode_sc_t*) scvp;
00192 
00193     if(bht_size == 1)
00194         bht[0] = (sc->lookup_bhr<<1)|outcome;
00195   }
00196 
00197   /* FLUSH */
00198   BPRED_FLUSH_HEADER
00199   {
00200     class bpred_bimode_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_bimode_sc_t*) scvp;
00201 
00202     if(bht_size == 1)
00203       bht[0] = sc->lookup_bhr;
00204   }
00205 
00206   /* GET_CACHE */
00207   BPRED_GET_CACHE_HEADER
00208   {
00209     class bpred_bimode_sc_t * sc = new bpred_bimode_sc_t();
00210     if(!sc)
00211       fatal("couldn't malloc bimode State Cache");
00212     return sc;
00213   }
00214 
00215 };
00216 
00217 #endif /* BPRED_PARSE_ARGS */
00218 #undef COMPONENT_NAME
